website_summaries.verdict: Comes with 4 GB of RAM and works best with Chrome, helping professionals that work with web-based applications.
pros: Once connected, this laptop provides high-speed collaboration and presentation capabilities
cons: Requires internet connectivity to activate most applications

customer_reviews.title: It was refurbished
customer_reviews.text: I did not see an add as refurbished. but that exactly what i got. I could have got a brand new one for the same price. not happy
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: GREAT KEYBOARD
customer_reviews.text: For those of us who used to type on IBM Selectric typewriters the feel of a keyboard is important; this one feels really good. It is also quite a bit faster than a 2-3 year old chromebook it replaced. It's no replacement for a Windows computer where one need a Microsoft Office Suite, but for web search and viewing, it's blazingly fast. FOR $180 you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Geldscheisser

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this lap-top Chrome Book
customer_reviews.text: This thing is basically a powerful PC that costs $192. I personally bought it to listen to Pandora and I can do so without using an AP because those are very unreliable. Since it is a PC with Google I just use chrome to log me in automatically to Pandora with no AP_Style problems (signal dropping). the almost full size key board, compact size and powerful modum are also a big plus. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Galt

customer_reviews.title: So far I love the Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: So far I love the Chromebook. It is so lightweight. Packing my laptop through airports etc is not fun. I bought this for use when doing genealogy research. I am planning a trip in May which will include going to cemeteries. With this Chromebook and my phone as a hotspot I can logon to my ancestry account right in the cemetery. I think this is going to work!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: First Chromebook and bought this to carry on motorcycle road trips and other travels. Perfect size for what I needed, and enjoy the keyboard versus a touch screen. Easier to pack than my laptop and seems rugged enough to withstand a few bumps now and then. Price was reasonable for my needs..Works fine and the battery certainly lasts longer than my laptop does.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: What a scam Google Chrome is running on people. Tracking your every move.
customer_reviews.text: This is junk spyware running a google invade your privacy scam. Google has turned into such monsters in the last few years. You cant do anything on this computer without google tracking your every move. Want to download a better browser like firefox and you cant unless you sign into google first and they watch your every move. Mysterious scum at google these days. If I could return this junk i would but I live outside the country and had this drop-shipped to my country of residence. Google ceo Sundar Pichai is a mild mannered monster !!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son
customer_reviews.text: I have two kids with autism. My son burns thru laptops like crazy. I needed a simple laptop that was easy to set up, easy to use and had just the basics. This was it. I don't have to deal with him deleting programs, clicking on settings or doing who knows what to it. It works perfectly for him, he can type his little lists, read about all the disney movies and actors, play his candy crush and I can be happy about the price. Battery life is good, Price is great, Arrived fast, in perfect condition and was easy to set up. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Y. S. Morentin

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Bad screen resolution, charger and laptop stopped working after a couple days of use, cant play 1080p videos. They play it up to be something that you can take on the go and it works just as well as any other laptop it doesnt. This is a Chromebook not a laptop and theres a fundamental difference between them being that Chromebooks are worthless. They’re slow and not user friendly. Need something small and on the go buy an actually laptop thats small or a freaking tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Read description clearly !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t see refurbished on the description. I got it today and it shut on me. It is refurbished not new. I’m returning it. I need a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a real laptop not one of these chromebooks.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't use it for what I bought it for. Put the flash drive in, reads it shows files, won't show pictures or videos. Should've just bought another real laptop instead I'd this thing. Lesson learned, cheap isn't good.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product...I  love it
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is my first chromebook. I've researched all different types and brands of chromebooks and I finally decided upon this one. I love the fact that it's 32G. It's very portable....and boots up really quickly. Using the chrome OS is not bad since I've got an android phone. Google sheets is a great alternative for excell. Opening an excell spread was a bit buggy ...but once I converted the file to google sheets it worked fine. Overall I love this chromebook. It's affordable and does what it says it would do.
customer_reviews.author: Raenel Salandy

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have this Samsung Chromebook and love it so much that I bought the same one for my 10 year old son to use for school projects. It’s extremely user-friendly and has everything you need without all the bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Casey ~BookObsessionConfessions~

customer_reviews.title: I RECEIVED A DIFFERENT MODEL, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: the model I was sent is a refresh of the Chromebook 3, so it has a longer lifespan and I can't complain about it! The performance of this machine is decent for the price. You should know what you want to do with it before you even consider purchasing it. I only needed it for editing text and a few pictures on Google Slides (I'm a language teacher) and this one is good enough for that. REMEMBER this Chromebook model will only get supported until June 2022.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Sora

customer_reviews.title: Works faster
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my very old Chromebook. Longer battery life, better pixel and sound. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo Wagnetti

customer_reviews.title: I won’t buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks after I received the Chromebook, the charger stopped working. I had to contact Samsung & they replaced it. Now, 2 months later it keeps dropping the internet connection. This Chromebook is a piece of junk and no one wants to stand behind it. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Basic.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is basic. A little slow dosnt run some of the apps very well, but does basic surfing, email, and word proccessing well. Small and light make good for travel, low quality screen and camera, and dosen't read the inserted memory card well.
customer_reviews.author: stephon baker

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware of color.  Its GREY not black.
customer_reviews.text: IN THE DESCRIPTION. Black laptop. I received Night Charcoal. Night charcoal is when the fire is put out. The next day the charcoal thats left is grey. Thats the color you will receive. A GREY laptop. The key board is black. I will keep the laptop. Im not happy cause i already opened the box. But this is the second merchant who has done this.
customer_reviews.author: Trendy

customer_reviews.title: Good for homework
customer_reviews.text: Improved sound over last chromebook purchased Bought two as gifts, works as expected
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Good Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This is our third Chromebook and while it is good, there are a few things different from the older ones. This one seems to have a delay between the touchpad and the system. We also noticed that the charger port is very small and feels flimsy. We'll see how it stands the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known about this years ago
customer_reviews.text: This product is simply amazing plug in log on to Google and you are all set!! This is perfect for me to use for school and to enjoy movies.. 32g is so fast I just am blown away by the simplicity of this product. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: perfect for basic web browsing and simple stuff like checking emails, online shopping and watching YouTube or Netflix. Speakers aren’t the worst either. Everything loads up fairly quick. Only thing that shows the cheap price is the screen. It’s pretty Low resolution. you’ll find yourself adjusting the screen a couple times to find the sweet spot but after a while you learn where it is. I highly recommend this laptop for someone that wants to do basic internet surfing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 of these for the kids schooling. They work great, great battery life. We only use them for their school work, google classroom and etc. Kids use them for Roadblocks and Minecraft also.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Currier

customer_reviews.title: Charging cord extremely loose
customer_reviews.text: I like the Samsung chromebook. Pretty much as expected the big drawback and why I only gave 3 stars is the charging cord and port are a very poor fit. It is extremely loose and you have to hold it in place for it to charge.
customer_reviews.author: VJC

customer_reviews.title: Not lockdown-friendly, freezes up constantly
customer_reviews.text: This Chromebook freezes up constantly. We can’t have any other device on WiFi, and only one window can be open at a time, for my son to use it properly. And forget using Zoom on it - it never works. It’s fine for Google Classroom...unless you have to watch a video via Classroom, and then it freezes. Spend your money on a different Chromebook that will actually get you through the lockdown.
customer_reviews.author: MZ32

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend as a school laptop
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for school! Fits easily in my backpack, lightweight, and long lasting battery. Fast enough to handle multiple tabs and capable of everything I needed for school
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my hubby. He likes it and says it is fast!
customer_reviews.author: Jannie Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great value and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chromebook for my homeschool kids. The only thing we dislike about it is we havent been able to figure out how to use it with our wacom drawing tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amber A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and fast boot
customer_reviews.text: I have acquired this to be used for VDI connection using Horizont Client and this works perfectly. Also I am using this to have remote access with my windows desktop and is working properly. The weight is good and the size fit perfect in my small bag pack.
customer_reviews.author: Rojasoscar

customer_reviews.title: Good for a 2nd home computer
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of disappointed with the color quality on the screen. It was not as brilliant as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon’s

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and perfect for my middle schooler
customer_reviews.text: The product came in as advertised. The chrome book is very light and holds the battery charge for a very long time. very convenient for my middle schooler specially during these days of virtual classes.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh

customer_reviews.title: Not a great screen, no home key
customer_reviews.text: Screen sucks for watching movies, constantly trying to tilt it just right. Sound is very tinny.
customer_reviews.author: House of Estrogen

customer_reviews.title: Was a Xmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: This Chrome Book is a very good unit and continues to perform very well. Some quirks you have to learn about with Chrome but otherwise perfect for the internet junkie.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Working great for school
customer_reviews.text: Been using this model for at least three months. Powers up fast. Good battery. Light weight and feel like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pickey

customer_reviews.title: Great but sent the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure I will love the product over all because it was highly recommended to me from a friend but I just got it and was sent the wrong color so I’m already irritated and having to buy a case because I don’t like the way it looks now and I have no other way of letting them know besides writing a review. But hopefully I enjoy it anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good for the pricepoint, short battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a lightweight travel option, If you are just watching movies on the plane and writing emails on the beach, this is great. However the battery life is short to say the least. I can see the life drain from the battery watching movies. For this pricepoint, it is a good machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bell

customer_reviews.title: Touchpad Inconsistencies
customer_reviews.text: I like the keyboard, but found the touchpad to be hard to manipulate smoothly, even when using a mouse. I could not find any way to turn off the touchpad when the mouse was in use. This resulted in "mixed messages." I wish that I had chosen a touch screen. That wouldn't solve all issues, but would likely have been a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Makaleka

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my son's home schooling, movies, and games
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I take online class and this laptop is very convenient. I love the size, screen quality is great. Its a bit heavy but not over the top, its manageable. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The computer is small and easily carry around - it is user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Marlene T.

customer_reviews.title: Saying it's a touch screen and it's not
customer_reviews.text: Bought it cuz it said it was a touch screen and it's not
customer_reviews.author: Dane crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great Value !
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a reasonable laptop and settled upon this - I’m basically using it as an internet surfing device and taking notes
customer_reviews.author: robert moody

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Love it easy to use very quick to get on internet a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Watson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Apple Pencil and IPad Pro go together like birds of a feather
customer_reviews.text: Love painting with my iPad and pencil. Large screen (12/9) is nice. Fast responses, great enhanced motion.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Power cord sloppy
customer_reviews.text: Feels and looks well made.However,power cord plug needed to be held inward and/or completely still in order to charge-that's not right for something new.I returned it and got a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W.

customer_reviews.title: Is fast and compact
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer for the money. It’s great for browsing and movies
customer_reviews.author: sandra manning

customer_reviews.title: Wanted the newer version
customer_reviews.text: Liked the Computer, just wanted the upgraded version!! Ordered 3 for my family!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need a laptop to do. I miss touch screen, but I knew I was giving that up for price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burmeister

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: This would be 5 stars if the product matched the advertised pictures. Product pictures show a black laptop. Laptop that arrived is grey. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first chromebook
customer_reviews.text: It's a little tiny for myself, but it's perfect size for my little kindergartener. Im pleased with this and am very happy it arrived before the expected delivery date!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought another make
customer_reviews.text: I went out of my way to buy a Samsung Chromebook. But I am disappointed to find it rather chunky and not a sleek as I expected.. Software rather unstable. For some reason I am having big printing difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Morley

customer_reviews.title: Do not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was buying a brand new computer. Instead I received an old dusty Ps4. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Carly T

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price that I paid
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for moderate work. I thought I was purchasing a touch screen. This is not a touch screen. Not great for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Latonya Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was secure and the laptop was new and in mint condition. Performance thus far is excellent. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not all apps wotk
customer_reviews.text: I really like this computer in general but not happy that some apps and programs are not compatible with the OS system.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hansen

customer_reviews.title: It fast, the battery last long.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product more to watch movies in Prime time in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Suramericana

customer_reviews.title: So far so good (:
customer_reviews.text: For the money it really is a good deal. So far it’s everything I need it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Sue

customer_reviews.title: Laptop Review
customer_reviews.text: This Laptop is great when my Laptop goes out I am going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Won’t turn on
customer_reviews.text: I take it out of the box and charge all the way till the light is green I’ve held the power button down and everything it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Kyler

customer_reviews.title: No virus's
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Chromebooks for the last 5 years. It does everything I need and is compact and light weight. perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and charge for use
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice size, lightweight chromebook that is easy to charge and use.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: I dint like the laptop at all
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is completely trash it keeps freezing and wont let me put my pictures on it
customer_reviews.author: Erma jones

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: 100% crap. Do yourself a favor and buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging after a month and a half. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chanoochi

customer_reviews.title: Great chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small chromebook for business travel, and this one met my needs. Well built, bright screen, and responsive touch pad. Using gmail and google drive in offline mode worked great. The chromebook played MP4, MKV, youtube and amazon prime videos smoothly. The bottom mounted speakers were loud enough for personal viewing, but I use headphones most of the time. If I needed to ever replace it, I would buy the unit again.
customer_reviews.author: chris u.

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get a good Chromebook, my Toshiba screen went bad after 3 years. Now I wish I would have paid more and gotten something better. This Samsung is slow to load, slow to type on, locks up so you have to wait until it catches up to continue what you were doing. I am really disappointed. I have tested it with fast and slow internet speeds, several tabs open and just one, makes no difference. I would NOT buy again. I really miss the Toshiba, quick and slick and backlit keys as well. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: #1shopper

customer_reviews.title: but my husband says this is not what he ordered so he is disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok, but my husband says this is not what he ordered so he is disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: threepeasinmn

customer_reviews.title: Very good size for a teen. No problems with antivirus.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter as Christmas present. She needed a wireless device to help do her work, read, and do research on the internet. No complaints so far!
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Grand Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grand daughter for Christmas. Helped her in school.
customer_reviews.author: Bill the BO
